features: Plug & Play: Wireless mouse comes with a tiny USB Nano receiver (stored within the back of the mouse), plug it into your PC, and then forget it.

2.4GHz Computer Mouse: Ensures reliable connection with an increased working distance of up to 15m (49ft) and eliminates delays, dropouts, and interference. An ergonomic mouse with a contoured shape and soft rubber grip ensure all-day comfort.

TECKNET Tru-Wave Technology: Wireless gaming mouse provides precise, intelligent cursor control over many surface types. TECKNET Co-Link technology – no need to re-establish pairing if a signal is lost or shut down.

Hassle-free Design: Wireless mouse for laptop has a smart auto-sleep mode to save power, and up to 24 months of battery life with a battery level indicator. (battery life may vary based on user and computing conditions).

Broad Compatibility: the USB mouse is compatible with Windows11,10,8.1,8,Vista 7,XP, Mac OS (Side buttons are not available), and Linux. Works with Notebook, Chromebook, PC, Laptop, Computer, and more. (batteries are NOT included)
36 MONTHS SUPPORT: If you encounter any problems in using the product, please feel free to contact our professional customer service team, enjoying TECKNET 36 Months Warranty (Registered Only)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Vibrant Colors Personalized for Your Desk

Tracks On Any Surface With precision sensor, it can be used in virtually any surface including resin, wood, paper, cloth and leather, especially on glass. Ergonomic Design TECKNET ergonomic optical mouse has a contoured shape and soft rubber grips to reduce 30% muscular strain and to provide all-day comfort. 2.4 GHz Wireless Connectivity You get the reliability of a wired mouse with cordless convenience and freedom—fast signal transmission and virtually no delays or dropouts from up to 49ft away.
Portable Mouse for Office or On-the-Go
Universal Compatibility Compatible with Win XP, Win Vista, Win 11/10/8/7, Vista 8/7, Chromebook, Mac OS Linux and etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pink Wireless Mouse with Endless Comfort 🐭
reviews.reviewText: Let me tell you, I'm not just clicking around; I'm dancing through cyberspace with this Pink Wireless Mouse! 🕺💃🌟**Plug & Play Magic:**🌟Unboxing this mouse was like a magician's trick! Plug in the tiny USB Nano receiver and it disappears, just like that! 🎩✨ It's like a game of hide and seek that's over before you know it. And oh boy, did it impress me with its 6 adjustable DPI levels. I've got more cursor speed options than I have dance moves! 💃🕺🌐**No More Connection Drama:**🌐I'm convinced this mouse has secret ninja powers. It not only ensures a reliable connection but also works up to 15 meters away! Say goodbye to delays and interference; this mouse has your back, whether you're in the same room or orbiting the moon. 🌕💫🤗**Comfort Fit Guaranteed:**🤗I don't know about you, but I've had mice that felt like bricks in my hand. Not this one! Its ergonomic design and soft rubber grip make it as comfy as your favorite pajamas. It's like holding a cloud while you surf the web. ☁️🌈**Tru-Wave Technology FTW:**🌈TeckNet Tru-Wave technology is the secret sauce here. It knows how to control that cursor, no matter where you're using it. I even tried it on a slice of pizza, and it still worked! 🍕🔌**Hassle-Free Power:**🔋The mouse even has a power-saving mode, so it's not burning through batteries faster than I can order a pizza. With up to 24 months of battery life, I might even forget where the batteries go by the time I need to replace them. And the battery level indicator? Genius! ⚡💡🌍**Universe of Compatibility:**🌍This mouse is like a universal translator; it speaks Windows, Mac, Linux, and more! It's the polyglot of the mouse world. 🌐🗺️In summary: This Pink Wireless Mouse is not just a mouse; it's your trusty sidekick on your digital adventures. It's comfortable, reliable, and packed with features that'll make your computer sessions smoother than a dance-off! 💃🎉

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works as a wireless mouse should. Easy to connect and turn on/off. I really like the scroll feature as well as the back button that is built in, I won’t buy a mouse without those now. Choose the color of your choice. Different color makes it easy to identify if you work in a common space. Durable, as I have dropped it a couple of times and it continues to work without fail. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really like this mouse
reviews.reviewText: This mouse came and for the price I wasn't expecting much. I was surprised by the quality. It works great and the ergonomics fit my hand. My son also used it and indicated he really liked it. I am going to order him one too. It takes a couple batteries, but the battery compartment is easy to access and closes securely so I don't anticipate problems with that. I appreciate that it came in a variety of colors so the mouse isn't confused with the traditional black-on-black mouse laying around the office and at home. I can tell it's mine because it's blue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cheap and works well.
reviews.reviewText: This mouse is very functional and wireless. I really love the color and the feel of it. If you have large hands you will not like this mouse as it is smaller. It connects easily to the computer, everything functions great and it’s easy to clean. Very lightweight and useful for many things.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels great, works great.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this wireless mouse to go with a new laptop I bought recently. I bought it because I've had a Tecknet wired mouse on my desktop computer. I like the feel of it my hand. Very comfortable. The wireless mouse connected almost instantly with my laptop, and I was able to use it with no problem. It works great. I have no problems with it jumping or stuttering. It auto enters a low power mode when not used for some time, and it takes one click of the left button to activate it. That's become automatic for me now. A great mouse for a great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I especially love the USB feature on this mouse. Just plug into a USB port and the mouse is ready for use. No download. I purchased as an added addition to my new laptop, and realized once it was delivered, I was able also use it with my older laptop, which works great. After many years of using the mouse pad on my older laptop, the mouse pad doesn't work very well. So my new mouse, allows me to use with multiple laptops. I just love it and would highly recommend to anyone looking for a mouse for an old laptop or newer laptop.D. Blanchard

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really good mouse
reviews.reviewText: I've been through a number of Logitech mice and have had issues with all of them. This one works so much better! Scroll works like it should, buttons are perfect and I don't find myself accidentally clicking them. It fits my hand perfect. If it sleeps I haven't noticed any reconnection delay. No connection issues or lag at all. It just works!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flexible and right size for my needs
reviews.reviewText: Provides all the functions I need and is easy to install. Quickly identified by my system and usually leave at home. Battery last a good amount of time. Haven't had to replace one yet after a few months.
Je n'est plus mal à mon tunnel carpienT( Québec)

reviews.reviewTitle: A GREAT mouse with all the features of more expensive mice
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a mouse with side buttons, as they are very useful while browsing and in file systems and can be configured. I initially looked for Logitech mice, but the cheapest option was 1800 rupees, which is very expensive. I finally settled at this mouse, and this is pretty much everything you can ask for in a mouse at a great price point.SIZE:It is perfectly sized for most users (see picture, I have pretty average-sized hands). Ergonomics are great, and it is a joy to hold in the hand. There is rubber padding on the thumb area, which adds extra gripBUTTONS & DPI:There are 5 DPI settings, and the mouse is configured at default of 1200 DPI. The main buttons on the mouse are clicky and have great feel and feedback. The DPI button is a bit loose, but again, not much to worry about as we don't change DPI frequently. The side buttons also have a bit of play in them, but I got used to it in a couple days. Mouse wheel has a good texture and grip to it.WEIGHT:The mouse uses 2 AAA cells that attach at the back, so it is slightly back-heavy. Overall the weight is normal, not excessively heavy or light. The receiver attaches magnetically into the mouse, and no need to open flaps to access it.Cannot comment on the battery life since haven't used it for that long. 18 months warranty is good though. The mouse is sturdy, I accidentally dropped it once but no scuffs or cracksOverall I am highly satisfied with the purchase. I wish the weight distribution was a bit more even, but considering the price point and all the other features, it is an easy recommendation.

reviews.reviewTitle: Exceeded my expectations, a great buy!!
reviews.reviewText: I have to admit, at first it took a while getting used to the new mouse (as my previous Microsoft mouse was slightly bigger but it had wheel problems and had no ON/OFF switch, hence the reason I was buying a new mouse) BUT this Tecknet mouse is FANTASTIC!! Battery life is EXCELLENT! So glad I didn't buy the cheaper ones out there on the market. This mouse has far exceeded my expectations and considering I use it 15 hours a day with no issues, I am happy with my purchase. It works great for my studies, gaming, browsing, laptop DJ sets and more! Thank you Tecknet :) Sticking to your brand from now on, and I have had enough of Microsoft mouse products. TECKNET for the win! :) 5 stars!

For the price, this mouse is of exceptional quality! Buttons, scroll wheel, sensor, and wireless transmission are all working great. This mouse has QUALITY switches for its left and right click buttons, AND a quality mouse wheel. The side buttons are in a perfect position, they easily help for productivity and overall usability.It arrived undamaged, and packaged nicely in a "frustration-free" product box.I should say that it is small- to medium-sized, overall. It is NOT tiny. For most people it will be comfortable to use. People with large hands might complain, but then, why wouldn't you be looking for a gaming mouse instead if you had large hands? Gaming mice have become much less expensive anyway. :) However, my hands are somewhat large myself, and I still find this mouse to be comfortable, nevertheless.
